| related = | website = }} '''''TTV''''' was a youth-aimed programming strand broadcast on [[RTÃ Two]] in [[Republic of Ireland|Ireland]], from 17:00 - 19:00, on weekdays. ''TTV'' replaced [[iD Two]], which was basically the same show with few differences, on Monday 19 September 2005. On 7 September 2009, ''TTV'' was replaced by another youth-aimed programming strand, ''[[Two Tube]]'', presented by Dara Quilty (radio presenter, guitarist and all round hero.)
==Presenters== * Liam Mc Cormack * [[Aidan Power]] * Sarah Morrissey * [[Darren Kennedy]] * [[Laura Woods]]
==TTV aired the following shows== * [http://www.rte.ie/tv/ttv/craprap/index.html Crap Rap] * [http://www.rte.ie/tv/ttv/eye2eye/index.html Eye2Eye] * [[Home and Away]] * [http://www.rte.ie/tv/ttv/managingtheuniverse/index.html Managing the Universe] * [[Neighbours]] * [http://www.rte.ie/tv/ttv/noexperiencerequired/index.html NERTY] - [[No Experience Required]], [[Transition Year]] * [http://www.rte.ie/tv/ttv/ontrial/ ...On Trial] * [http://www.rte.ie/tv/ttv/oneminutejuniorfilms/index.html One Minute Junior Films] * [[Sabrina, the Teenage Witch (TV series)|Sabrina, the Teenage Witch]] * [[SCOPE (TV series)|SCOPE]] * [http://www.rte.ie/tv/ttv/sms/ SMS] * [http://www.rte.ie/tv/ttv/swededtv/ Sweded TV] * [http://www.rte.ie/tv/ttv/teenology/index.html Teenology] * [[The Cafe (chat show)|The Cafe]] * [http://www.rte.ie/tv/ttv/theonceaweekshow/index.html The Once A Week Show] * [[The Simpsons]] * [[My Wife and Kids]]
